prompts: Create a ghost-type Pokemon with a spooky atmosphere and a pumpkin-like body.
Design a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of Halloween with vibrant colors and a playful demeanor.
Imagine a creature that combines the features of a pumpkin and a ghost, perfect for autumn.
Generate a Pokemon with a whimsical, haunting appearance, featuring a flowing scarf and eerie eyes.
Make a ghostly Pokemon that roams forests, adorned with a spooky jack-o'-lantern face.
Show me a Pokemon that represents both the darkness of the night and the warmth of a pumpkin.
Give me a unique Pokemon inspired by Halloween traditions, with a blend of eerie and cute elements.
